data.title: Third Age Total War Online Battle #14 - (2v1 Siege) - Battle of Weathertop
data.description:
A small Hobbit Merchant convoy protected by a handful of Dunedain, are under attack by Bolg.  He is marching out his armies to to gain more territory in Middle Earth.  The Hobbits send out there fastest riders to call for aid.  Will anyone answer the call?  Will the Hobbit survive?  Enjoy :D

Also if you liked the video be sure to give it a like!


Download the battle here:
Single Player: http://www.mediafire.com/download/b1d62778mqwc6sc/weathertop.rar

Multiplayer: http://www.mediafire.com/download/ld26d54caoh3aga/weathertop_MP.rar 
_

How to play Medieval 2 Total War & Rome Total War Online!

I block it out because the Mini-Map gives away who sent in the battle replay.  And in most cases whoever sends in the battle replay wins the battle.  So I block it to keep it a surprise :D

data.title: Elder Scrolls Total War Online Battle #4 - (2v2) - Happy Halloween!
data.description:
Happy Halloween!!  The army of the Undead have risen, and want to destroy the world of the living.  But there is hope, a small army will stand their ground and will fight the undead head on.  Will they make it through the night?  Or will all hope be lost?...Enjoy :D

I hope everyone has a safe and fun Halloween :D

data.title: SIEGE OF ESGAROTH - Third Age Total War Gameplay
data.description:
It was another beautiful day in Esgaroth, but that was short lived.  Rhun sent a small invasion force to take the lake town.  Dale desperately rounded up troops to put up a defense.  Things were not looking good, but hope was not lost.  Elves from Mirkwood sent a small relief force to aid Esgaroth.  All the forces will met at the lake town for an epic conclusion.  Enjoy :D
